content:
The REI flagship store in Seattle is a must-visit for any outdoor enthusiast. The store is massive, with an incredible selection of outdoor gear and clothing. The staff is indeed very knowledgeable and passionate about the outdoors, and they'll be able to provide you with expert advice on the trails you're planning to hike.

Make sure to explore the entire store, as they have a variety of sections dedicated to different outdoor activities, such as hiking, camping, climbing, and more. They also have a great selection of outdoor apparel and footwear, so you can gear up for your adventures.

When you talk to the staff, be sure to ask about any specific concerns or questions you may have about the trails you're planning to hike. They'll be able to provide you with valuable insights and advice on things like trail conditions, difficulty levels, and any necessary gear or precautions.

And don't forget to try out those snacks you packed! It's always a good idea to test them out before heading out on a long hike to make sure they're to your liking. You might even discover some new favorite snacks to add to your outdoor adventure arsenal.

Have a great time at the REI flagship store, and I hope you find everything you need for your outdoor adventures in Seattle!
